page.title: 05PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content: Here are some games that we play in our playground at school. {"Rebound". You need a ball and a wall.6 or less people can play.One person kicks the ball against the wall. When it bounces number two kicks it against the wall. Number three kicks it then four then five.Then six then one again.If someone misses the wall they are out of the game.If someone kicks the ball when it is not their turn they are out.The game ends when one person is left. He is the winner. {"Cat and mouse". You need about 20 people. 1 person is cat and 1 person is mouse.The rest of the people stand in a circle with 1 arm pointing out of the circle.The cat chases the mouse round the outside and if he catches it they change over.
